full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Tender Reference Number**: W8476-256891/A

**Publication Date**: May 27, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: July 10, 2024, at 14:00:00

**Description of the Tender**
---------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a tender for the supply of Electric Walkie Stacker Forklift, Group 4A, 4B, and 4C, with training and related items, in accordance with Supply Arrangement E60HS-21FRKL.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The tender is for the supply of eight (8) Electric Walkie Stacker Forklifts, Group 4A, 4B, and 4C, with training and related items, to be delivered within 180 days after receipt of order.

**Pre-qualifying and Injection into Supply Arrangement**
---------------------------------------------------

Only Suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A are eligible to participate in this bid solicitation process. For information on how to become pre-qualified for a SA, please visit the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-653-79868

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**
----------------------------------

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The notice is published on CanadaBuys for a period of 29 calendar days.

**Language of the Documents**
---------------------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada, English or French.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact:
Dong Le, [dong.le@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dong.le@forces.gc.ca), (000) 000-0000

**Trade Agreements and Regions**
------------------------------

This procurement is governed by the following trade agreements: The Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), The Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, The Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), The Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), The Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, The Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), The World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), The Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (
